text: 14:22 Matyu 7:14; Aposel 11:23; 15:32; 18:23; 1 Tesalonika 3:3Aning gavgavim suren gumazamizibagh anɨga akurvazir mɨgɨrɨgɨabar me gamua ghaze, ia uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar tuivigh gavgafigh. Aning kamaghɨn me mɨgɨa ghaze, “E God Bizibagh Ativaghamin Dughiamɨn aven mangɨsɨ, e faragh osɨmtɨzir avɨribar aven mangɨgham.”
